ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026**  
Taking place on February 21, 2026, the Footprints Festival continues its tradition of celebrating musical diversity and artistic innovation. Featuring 11 artists spanning a wide range of genres, from electronic and psychedelic to jazz, Anatolian rock, and Malian desert blues, the lineup offers an eclectic mix that promises to captivate audiences. With an average rating of 7.73 and 100% of rated artists scoring above 6, the festival guarantees a high-quality experience for music lovers.

This year’s lineup reflects a strong commitment to cultural and geographical diversity, with artists hailing from 10 countries, including Germany, Iran, Turkey, and Brazil. The festival also highlights underrepresented voices, with 7 out of 11 artists identifying as people of color and a mix of male, female, and mixed-gender acts. This inclusive approach ensures a rich tapestry of perspectives and sounds that transcend borders and genres.

Footprints Festival 2026 is more than just a musical event; it’s a celebration of global artistry and collaboration. With all artists featured on Spotify, attendees can explore the lineup in advance and prepare for a day of discovery and connection. Whether you're drawn to the minimalist beats of electropop, the soulful strains of R&B, or the vibrant rhythms of Afrobeat, this year’s festival promises to leave an indelible mark.
